submission:
def min_changes(nums, k)
m = Hash.new { |hash, key| hash[key] = [] }
v = []
populate_map_and_vector(nums, k, m, v)

ans = nums.size
v.sort!
m.each do |diff, values|
  t = v.bsearch_index { |x| x >= diff } || v.size
  t = t * 2 + (nums.size / 2 - t)

  values.each do |x|
    if x < diff
      t -= 2
    else
      t -= 1
    end
  end

  ans = [ans, t].min
end

ans
end

private

def populate_map_and_vector(nums, k, m, v)
n = nums.size
(0...n / 2).each do |i|
  a = nums[i]
  b = nums[n - i - 1]
  diff = (a - b).abs

  x = [a, b, k - a, k - b].max
  m[diff] << x
  v << x
end
end
